title: Visions of perfection
creator_credit: Diane Charleson, Prahran School Support Centre and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: The Victoria College of the Arts provides a venue for talented children in the performing arts of music and dance to combine these with their academic studies in a high school setting. A student violinist, percussionist, ballet dancer and pianist talk about the courses available and demonstrate some of the activities in the school.
